attributes.action: Hold this Government & SAGE to account. Full transparency immediately.
attributes.additional_details: In last 12 months None of data around % population/age affected, masks etc has changed but policy has been ramped up. We are entitled to evaluate all evidence on key issues and our concerns represented. 12 months on from outbreak of virus in UK, goalposts have shifted from being a 3 week period to “protect the NHS” to indefinite lockdown. Not even a vaccine is going to bring these authoritarian policies to an end and the general public are entitled to answers
attributes.background: Questions need to be put urgently to SAGE in public by a broad group of highly qualified UK doctors, scientists, economists, psychologists using a strong and broad multidisciplinary evidence base to challenge the Government’s policies developed via SAGE.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Establish a peoples scientific and medical panel
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549552

Review the role and membership of the SAGE group
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567585

Publish all SAGE and Government data and models used to develop Covid-19 policy
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558595
